data.name: Jaime Jiménez
data.Profile: Software engineer passionate for technology and committed with new challenges, working in support, maintenance and software development from 2009 with different tools and frameworks for PlSql, Java, Python, Javascript, Php. Working in core banking and finance systems in Quality Assurance teams during the last 7 years. Well versed managing windows and linux environments. Agilism optimist and Scrum Master certified. Strong background in customer relations.

certificate.name: Oracle Universal Banking 12 Technical Implementation Specialist Assesment

certificate.institution: Software Engineering Institute - Carnegie Mellon University
certificate.name: PSP Developer
